name: The Lumination Holographic Purse
description:
The Lumination Holographic PurseÂ will elevate your standards of fashion to new heights. This light-reflective, color-changing purse was designed to be carried anywhere for your convenience. Due to its lightweight nature, the purse is perfect to grab and go. Moreover, what makes this purse unique is that it shines even during the day! Each unique angle of the purse will provide you with a vibrant array of colors.Â Â With this purse, you will have everyone screaming "WOW". This high-quality purse shines like no other and is calling for you to buy it.

Are you the type of person that always carries their phone and wallet with them wherever they go? It would be great to have something to carry those small items in, but a handbag is just too big. If so, the Lumination Holographic Purse is just the bag for you. The purse was crafted to be the right size for any miscellaneous items.Â 

Are you the type of person who loses track of their everyday items easily? Well, the Lumination Holographic Purse can change that for you. Now, you will have the most efficient (and stylish) way to store your phone, wallet, and maybe even some chapstick. Thanks to the purse's unique ability to shine bright, there is no way you will be able to lose it amongst your other belongings.

Lumination believes in standing out from the rest no matter the occasion. That includes small items like purses that peopleÂ may not pay much attention to. If you truly want to achieve complete freedom of expression, then the Lumination Holographic Purse is the bag for you. 

The colors on this purse cannot be compared to any other purse on the market. The design of the purse captures the warmth, joyfulness, and the desire to shine in any environment.Â 

Sizing & Materials

The Lumination HolographicÂ Purse's exterior is crafted withÂ polyurethane leather. This means thatÂ this bag isÂ made 100%Â freeÂ of animal cruelty.Â 

This Purse is 7 inches tall, 11 inches wide, and 2.9 inches deep.

Chain Strap
This Purse includes an additional chain strap, featuring Lumination's GunMetal Color technology. This strap is fully detachable and adjustable, allowing you to fully customize the looks and feels of your purse!




Design, Storage, & Features

The interior of thisÂ purse is crafted with Lumination's Purple Soul Lining, created from fiber cloth and polyester.
Includes one, interior zipper compartment, allowing you to securely store small objects.Â 

Featuring a smooth zipper close, allowing you to fully seal your purse.
